metadata.name: Soulbound Legendary #1
metadata.description:
The 21st century proves to be one of the most trying times human civilization has ever endured. The perilous times propelled Rikka to architect the Anime Metaverse - a real life-like world inside the web3. Our collection of 5,000 Soulmates will represent your avatars in Anime Metaverse.

Supernova airdrop for Legendaries and 1-of-1 has been executed. Please do not buy Legendaries and 1-of-1 for the Supernova airdrop, only buy it for the art!
